text: But the answer of his folk was) the response of Abraham's folk when he called them to believe in Allah was (only that they said: �Kill him� or �Burn him�.) or throw him in the Fire. (Then Allah saved him from the Fire) without harm. (Lo! Herein) in that which We did with the folk of Abraham (verily are portents) lessons (for folk who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an.
